title: An answer to the Bishop of Condom (now of Meaux) his Exposition of the Catholick faith, &c. wherein the doctrine of the Church of Rome is detected, and that of the Church of England expressed from the publick acts of both churches : to which are added reflections on his pastoral letter.
author: Gilbert, John, b. 1658 or 9.
publisher: Printed by H.C. for R. Kettlewel and R. Wells ...,
